summary:
- **Announcement Type**: Appendix 3G – Notification of issue of unquoted securities (Performance Rights).  
- **Key Detail**:  
  - **20,000,000 ASRAH Performance Rights** issued on 30/06/2025 under an employee incentive scheme (non-quoted).  
  - **No issuance to KMPs** (Key Management Personnel).  
  - **Post-issue totals**:  
    - **Quoted**: 3.99B ASR ordinary shares, 600.95M ASRO options (expiry 01-Feb-2026).  
    - **Unquoted**: 100M ASRAH Performance Rights, 6M ASRAR Performance Rights (expiry 10-Jan-2026), 1M ASRAD options (expiry 23-Jun-2026), 524.38M ASRAG options (expiry 02-Sep-2027).  
  - **Regulatory**: Issued under Listing Rule 7.2 Exception 13 (no shareholder approval required).  

*(Omitted: Entity background, legal boilerplate.)*
